name: Gladiator Beast
author: Swordfish111
notes:
Easy KOG yesterday. Basically switch all their monsters to defense and you can whack the heck out of 'em thanks to holy guard. triple-econ and triple-floodgate are so good against CA and ninjas.

Nerokius is my favorite for fusion cause he can secure some games. Im using triple Murmillo because he's the mvp of the deck.
